@/sram-free.description: Measure free Static Random Access Memory (SRAM).

description: Node for measuring the amount of free Static Random Access Memory (SRAM). Based on https://github.com/mpflaga/Arduino-MemoryFree. For more information on getting the most from your Arduino memory, see: https://learn.adafruit.com/memories-of-an-arduino.
name: memory-free
